name: Diceman Execution
description:
For committing heinous dicecrimes, you have been sentenced to Die. Try not to.

Diceman Execution is an arcade action game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, to fit the theme "Roll of the Dice". Try to stay alive and defeat a never-ending onslaught of dice to rack up a high score!

How to play:

Move using WASD or Arrow Keys to any square that matches the numbers on the sides of your die. It's a top-down game, though, so just remember that the number on the bottom is 7 minus the number on top, and the rest of the numbers 1-6 will be on the sides:

  • Die shows 1 on top   =>   Sides are 2, 3, 4, 5
  • Die shows 2 on top   =>   Sides are 1, 3, 4, 6
  • Die shows 3 on top   =>   Sides are 1, 2, 5, 6
  • Die shows 4 on top   =>   Sides are 1, 2, 5, 6
  • Die shows 5 on top   =>   Sides are 1, 3, 4, 6
  • Die shows 6 on top   =>   Sides are 2, 3, 4, 5

Get stuck? Press Spacebar to reroll your die and open up a new path! Also, Spacebar shoots bullets in each direction, which will probably help you survive.
